title: Late Summer Self-Care with Chinese Medicine
description: Discover the wisdom of Chinese Medicine's fifth season, Late Summer, in our newest free seasonal self-care course!
cleaned_text: Actions Panel Late Summer Self-Care with Chinese Medicine Discover the wisdom of Chinese Medicine's fifth season, Late Summer, in our newest free seasonal self-care course! Date and time Location Online About this event - 3 hours - Mobile eTicket Discover the wisdom of Chinese Medicine's fifth season, Late Summer, in our newest seasonal self-care course. Learn about the element and organs of the season, enjoy nourishing foods, practice acupressure points daily, and reflect on self-care through journal prompts to bring balance and harmony to your life. Join us for a transformative journey toward optimal well-being. You can access this online course here: [https://felekwellness.podia.com/late-summer-self-care-with-chinese-medicine](https://felekwellness.podia.com/late-summer-self-care-with-chinese-medicine) Tags About the organizer [Felek Acupuncture](https://www.eventbrite.com/o/felek-acupuncture-69301638293) We welcome you to our Chinese Medicine clinic located on Solano Ave. in Albany, CA. Our mission is to provide the community with a haven of healing, encompassing not only physical remedies like Acupuncture and Chinese Herbal Medicine, but also a range of classes and gatherings dedicated to enriching your mind, spirit, creativity, and sense of belonging. Among these offerings are regular events like the serene Meditation & Tea sessions, the revitalizing Qigong in the Garden sessions, as well as unique experiences like Acupuncture & Sound Healing, Haiku & Meditation gatherings, tranquil Garden Painting sessions, and much more.
